title: SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Nap Lajoie - SGC 50!!
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Nap Lajoie - SGC 50!!
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a beautiful 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear Nap Lajoie graded SGC 50.

There are only two others graded by SGC w/ a higher numberic grade!  You will see that there is no paper loss or creasing...only some light staining and soft corners.

Sorry for the crappy SGC encapsulated scan (I will get a new scanner soon). See pre-grading scans below for better image of the card front and back.

Asking SOLD.

First to e-mail me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] and say "I'll take it" will be the new owner! PM's are acceptable.
